comments.body: Why aren't the checks just in the config? Would make the whole logic simpler.

> Why aren't the checks just in the config? Would make the whole logic simpler.

I need checks per-poststarthook and I can also envision someone having their own `PrepareRun`  which wants to add more health checks.  I think the complication is contained to a library that few will see as opposed to leaking out of the API.
hadn't read the post hook part yet when I wrote this comment
